resources.string: Failed to start the FTP server, no wifi?

\ Thanks for using SwiFTP! Here are some brief usage instructions. More information can be \ found at http://www.swiftp.org.

\ \ SwiFTP allows you to run an ftp server on your android device. This means that any program \ can access the files on your device while the ftp server is running. For example, entering \ 'ftp://...' in the firefox url bar will allow you to browse the files on your device from \ a desktop pc or a laptop.

\ \ By default, the user name and password are both 'ftp', you should change them. You use \ this username and password when accessing the server.\ 

\ The global proxy is a way to connect to your device from anywhere on the net. Your \ traffic is routed through some proxy servers in order to avoid firewall and NAT problems. \ If you enable this feature, make sure you have a strong password, because anyone can \ attempt to connect to your device. The global proxy feature can be enabled or disabled \ from the setup screen.

\ \ There is a configuration option ("keep phone awake") that fixes a problem where \ file transfers go slow or stop completely when the phone sleeps. If you have this \ problem, check this box and restart SwiFTP. Your phone will stay awake as long as \ the server is running.\ 

\ For power and security reasons, it is recommended that the server be stopped after use.

\ \ If something is not working the way you expect it to, please report it to me at www.swiftp.org.

\ \ Thanks for using SwiFTP, and look for more improvements soon.

\

\Description: \ SwiFTP allows you to run an ftp server on your android device.

\Programming: \ Dave Revell (dave.revell@gmail.com), Pieter Pareit (pieter.pareit@gmail.com)

\License: \ GNU General Public License v3.0

\Source Code: \ http://ppareit.github.com/swiftp/

\
The username must consist of 1 or more letters. No other characters are allowed.
The password must consist of 1 or more alphanumeric characters. No other characters are allowed.
The port number must be in the range 1 to 65535.
Warning: storage is not available. You may want to unmount it.
